summary: A small mod that converts the Pelagius Wing into a livable house with mannequins, displays, merchants and a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://creationk.it/files/Domus-Imperatoris/Files/domus-imperatoris-logo-white-small.png[/img]
Pelagius Wing... refurnished. Beautiful, organized and livable.[/center]


[b][i]About[/i][/b]
This is an attempt to remake the Pelagius Wing. Seeing that place left in ruins and all messed up was horrible... what a waste of a fine room in the Blue Palace. So I thought I could make some changes there, and so I did. Now the Wing is livable. Rooms, chests, mannequins, displays, NPCs and all. It's worth downloading this mod.


[b][i]Features[/i][/b]
[list] [*]A new follower
[*]New merchants
[*]Smithing, Alchemy and Conjuration trainers
[*]Lots of chests
[*]Mannequins
[*]Busts for your dragon priest masks
[*]Holders for your dragon claws
[*]Displays for your Daedric items
[*]More displays for your unique items
[*]A bar (and a bartender)
[*]A bard
[/list]
[b][i]Dragonborn Addon Features[/i][/b]
[list][*]Displays for your unique Dragonborn items
[*]A statue of Miraak (you need his items in order to activate it)
[*]A training room with buttons for you to choose the NPC to kill
[*]Displays for your Black Books
[/list]
[b][i]Dawnguard Addon Features[/i][/b]
[list][*]Displays for your Elder Scrolls
[/list][b][i]FAQ[/i][/b]
[list] [*]Will this mod affect The Mind of Madness in any way? A: No, not at all. This was my first worry.
[*]Will this mod conflict with any other mod? A: Only if this mod changes something in the Wing.
[*]Is this mod DLC-friendly? A: Yes. No problems found so far. Tested with all DLCs.
[*] Does this mod require an DLC or another mod? A: The main file doesn't, but the addons do. Each addon is described with the thing it needs.
[*]Can I make a suggestion? A: Not only can you make a suggestion, but you should. Suggestions are always welcome. If you find any bugs or problems, please report.
[*]What is this training room? A: An arena with 5 buttons. Each button has an NPC spawn list, by category. You can spawn the NPCs and use them to train your skills or just watch them fight for fun.
[*]Some characters are walking in places they weren't supposed to. Why? A: There was a HUGE problem with the navmeshes. Update your mod to v1.2 to get this fixed.
[/list]
[b][i]Credits[/i][/b]
Special thanks to Vulon for voicing Ahmad. Thanks to LadyTarantula for reporting bih issues which are now fixed. Also, thanks to anyone who downloaded and endorsed my mod. [center][b][i]Other mods of mine[/i][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40849]Domus Imperatoris[/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48764]Mining Guild[/url] | [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41567]Zumul Thu'um[/url][/b][/center]
author: thaalesalves
